title: How to Unpair an Amazon Fire Stick Remote

steps.title: Unplug your Fire Stick from its power source.
steps.content: Unplug your Fire Stick from its power source. Make sure to unplug the power supply from the outlet or disconnect the device from the HDMI port. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Input batteries in your new Fire Stick remote.
steps.content: Input batteries in your new Fire Stick remote. Amazon will most likely provide you with the needed batteries. Most Fire Stick remotes require two AAA batteries.

steps.title: Turn on your Fire Stick.
steps.content: Turn on your Fire Stick. Plug it back into the power source or reconnect the device to the HDMI port.

steps.title: Hold the Home button to pair the device.
steps.content: Hold the Home button to pair the device. Home is indicated by the house icon in the center of your remote. [2] X Research source This pairing process may take up to 20 seconds. When successfully paired, you will receive an on-screen notification.

steps.title: Turn on your Fire Stick.
steps.content: Turn on your Fire Stick. Make sure the device is properly attached to your TV's HDMI slot. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Using the new remote, navigate to "Settings".
steps.content: Using the new remote, navigate to "Settings". This will be indicated by the cog icon located on the far right of the home screen. In Settings , you'll also find the option to update your Fire Stick to ensure it runs smoothly at all times.

steps.title: Scroll down to "Controllers & Bluetooth Devices".
steps.content: Scroll down to "Controllers & Bluetooth Devices". You'll be able to pair, unpair, and manage your Bluetooth devices. This is where you can pair Fire Stick remote alternatives .

steps.title: Click on Amazon Fire TV Remotes.
steps.content: Click on Amazon Fire TV Remotes . This will bring up all Fire TV remotes currently connected to your TV.

steps.title: Select the old Fire Stick remote you want to unpair.
steps.content: Select the old Fire Stick remote you want to unpair. Hovering over the option will provide more information on the right.

steps.title: Press ☰.
steps.content: Press ☰ . Be sure you're using the new remote to navigate.

steps.title: Press the select button to confirm unpairing.
steps.content: Press the select button to confirm unpairing. The select button is the middle circle button on your remote. The old Fire Stick remote will be removed from your Fire TV.
